title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 5 lots of physical crypto chips available:LOT 1: 2017 LIMX BlueBits 0.001BTC #NR1067BTChttps://mempool.space/address/1KYShPkGkWZqDEmUTnBcmneH3WtxGsmD1pSTARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 2: 2018 Moonbits Bitcore 1 BTX #M00147LOT 3: 2018 Moonbits Bitcore 2.5 BTX #K00085LOT 4: 2018 Moonbits Bitcore 5 BTX #J00081LOT 5: 2018 Moonbits Bitcore 10 BTX #I00033**Funding for the BTX chips cannot be verified using the given address on each chip**STARTING BID LOT 2-5: 0.0001BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 1st, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.created_time: October 26, 2023, 12:50:34 AMLast edit: October 26, 2023, 12:01:31 PM by Kryptowerk
comments.body: Holding back on bidding for lot 1, so some others have a chance to grab this rare chip. Just saying all these old Bluebits BTC chips are really hard to come by, most were sold to random crypto folks at conferences (afaik) and god knows if these people ever find their way into the forum.There were only 49 of the yellow 0.001 chip ever made to begin with. See: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0And: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/tx.dws?280521064.htmSame goes for the blue 10 BTX chip. Only 50 made.GL

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on October 26, 2023, 02:06:29 AMQuote from: Spokanistan51 on October 26, 2023, 02:05:45 AMAny info/pics on the 10 BTC chip? Can't say I have ever heard of it before?  Quote from: Kryptowerk on October 26, 2023, 12:50:34 AMHolding back on bidding for lot 1, so some others have a chance to grab this rare chip. Just saying all these old Bluebits BTC chips are really hard to come by, most were sold to random crypto folks at conferences (afaik) and god knows if these people ever find their way into the forum.There were only 49 of the yellow 0.001 chip ever made to begin with. See: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0And: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/tx.dws?280521064.htmSame goes for the blue 10 BTC chip. Only 50 made.GLI think he meant 10 BTX chip.Ah yes, correct. Sorry for the confusion, it's indeed the 10 BTX chip I was talking about. There 100% is no 10 BTC chip. If I had any additional info, I'd put it in the reference thread, so rest assured I wouldn't casually drop an info bomb like that.
